Name: Foxy's Adventure
About the game: You must save your lover. To do this, you will have to fight against an evil monsters. You have to collect all gems and cherries in each stages. You will travel through 5 Worlds and fight against Bosses. It won't be an easy journey. So get ready for some real challenge. Good Luck little Fox! Features: * You control a little fox in a platform game. * To pass each stage, collect a certain amount of fruit and gems. * Your task is to collect a certain number of them. * Eliminate hordes of enemies on your way. * Use a boomerang weapon to destroy enemies. * You can also jump on the heads of some of them. * Eliminate wooden crates and activate switches on your way. * Explore 5 worlds with unique gameplay.
